Profile Summary
Electrical  Engineer  with  over  4+  year’s  experience  into  electrical  designs  and
systems development in building and industrial constructions.
Proven abilities in testing, analysis and project co-ordination
Sound technical knowledge with national and International working Experience
Safety process oriented along with proven technical and training skills .
An effective communicator with strong analytical, problem solving & organizational 
abilities.

Division – First (73 % marks)

Key Skill & Competencies
Strong decision-making skills and the ability to prioritize and plan effectivelyMethodical approach to all tasks

Professional Experience
Company - Al Rashid Trading and Contracting Company Ltd, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
Project - KAP 4, Dormitories 
Designation - Site Electrical Engineer
Duration – November 2014 to November 2016
Responsibility:
Review and coordinate design drawings and specifications to ensure compliance
with project requirements .
Responsible of all activities pertaining to the electrical services, low current &
control systems in the projects
Participate in all the site electrical works for medium voltage and low voltage
networks & low current systems including substation, electrical panel boards,
indoor  electrical  distribution,  Earthing  protection,  outdoor  lighting,  telephone,
data & TV networks, fire alarm System.
Perform and implement value-engineering proposals on the design
Coordinate between electrical discipline and all other engineering disciplines
Tackle all the engineering correspondences related to electrical woks
Attend the testing and commissioning for the electrical systems
Company - Kevin Power solution Ltd, Noida, India 
Designation -Assistant Engineer (Electrical)
Duration - July 2012 to August 2014
Responsibility:
Review of electrical drawings, specifications& calculations
Power Back System(UPS and inverter ) design and installation
Provide  full Technical Support to our electrical team  for DB installation, Panel
dressing, wiring, cable tray installation, cable laying,etc
Check the entire work as according to approved drawing
Coordinating with the other departments, clients and contractors
 Manage manpower and material  required for the site
Maintain DPRTackle all the electrical correspondences related to electrical woks
Company – Belz Instrumentation Pvt Ltd, Faridabad, India
Designation - Calibration Engineer
Duration –July 2012 to may 2013 (Part time)
Responsibility:
Testing and calibration of all electrical & electronics measuring  instruments such
as power meters, energy meters, clamp meters,multimeters,hv proves, breakdown
tester,  current  transformer,  potential  transformer,  power  supply,  pressure
transmitter,hv instruments,etc
Preparation of report with uncertainty.
Technical Support for site work
